negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2013

Class AC_InoxAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.boaframework.BOA
      • genius.core.boaframework.AcceptanceStrategy
        • negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2013.AC_InoxAgent

  • public class AC_InoxAgent
extends AcceptanceStrategy
    This Acceptance Condition will break when the reservation value seems to be a better alternative, and accept when the opponents offer is better than ours or when the opponents offer is higher than a time dependent function.
    Author:
    Ruben van Zessen, Mariana Branco

      • determineAcceptability

        public Actions determineAcceptability()
        Method which returns the action selected by this acceptance strategy.
        Specified by:
        determineAcceptability in class AcceptanceStrategy
        Returns:
        one of three possible actions: Actions.Accept, Actions.Reject, Actions.Break.

      • acceptUtil

        public double acceptUtil(double t)
        Method that returns the minimal utility at which we accept an opponents offer. The function used depends on time and the opponents best discounted offer.
        Parameters:
        t - Normalized current time in the negotiation
